name: Easy YouTube Video Downloader button CSS
description: This style is obsolete. Go for the Download YouTube Videos as MP4 addon instead. Easy YouTube Video Downloader is an awesome extension for Firefox that allows you to download YouTube videos in various formats. Unfortunately it doesn't go with any particular theme unless it's forced to through other styles. This style is for people who don't want to use an entirely different theme, but rather make it conform (At least initially) to the YouTube standard theme.
additional_info:
Fair warning -- If I update this again, you will lose custom settings -- Copy what you have elsewhere before updating!

0.1 - Initial release
0.5 - Second release

[0.1] Planned changes: Maybe fix the menu to fit the standard YouTube theme as well, but if you're not a file hoarder. this won't matter. Also will break if YouTube decides to YET AGAIN change their interface.

[0.5] Fixed the button up to have focus and hover settings, it looks more and more like an actual part of the YouTube interface. Still thinking about messing with the menu, but the next release will be trying to get that blue aura around the button when unselected, like the Share button does.

[0.5.1] Added note about obsoletion.

Depends on Easy YouTube Video Downloader, previous install link doesn't work -- Use link below to visit the install page. Still no restart required!

https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/easy-youtube-video-downl-10137/
